comments.content:
It looks like this is from neutron-server hanging: http://logs.openstack.org/37/98737/18/gate/gate-tempest-dsvm-neutron-full/1adef2a/logs/screen-n-api.txt.gz?level=INFO#_2014-08-29_13_03_38_109

comments.content: This is causing neutron-server to hang and block on incoming API calls
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jogo

comments.content:
Interesting...this was also observed while testing DVR (report available [1]). Bug #1356121 has been addressed by skipping auto scheduling altogether, but I am not sure the same fix is applicable in the context of centralized routers.

[1] - https://bugs.launchpad.net/neutron/+bug/1356121
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~armando-migliaccio
